initialize_GLYstruct.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /* File initialize_GLYstruct.c begun on 20071207 by BLFoley
00002  * Purpose: provide initialization functions for structures in molecules.h
00003  *
00004  * NOTES:       char* variables are not initialized
00005  *              void pointers are not initialized
00006  *              all other pointers:
00007  *                      -- the number of pointers integer is set to zero
00008  *                      -- one pointer is calloc'd (in anticipation of realloc)
00009  */
00010 #include <mylib.h>
00011 #include <molecules.h>
00012 //#include "../inc/mylib.h"
00013 //#include "../inc/molecules.h"
00014 
00015 void initialize_coord_3D(coord_3D *c) {
00016 c[0].i=c[0].j=c[0].k=0; 
00017 return;
00018 }

00020 void initialize_vectormag_3D(vectormag_3D *v) {
00021 v[0].i=v[0].j=v[0].k=v[0].d=0; 
00022 return;
00023 }

00025 void initialize_plane(plane *p) {
00026 p[0].A=p[0].B=p[0].C=p[0].D=0;
00027 return;
00028 }

00030 void initialize_atype(atype *at) {
00031 at[0].n=0; // atomic number
00032 at[0].nb=0; // number of typical bonds for this atom type
00033 at[0].nlp=0; // number of typical lone pairs (to check geometry sanity)
00034 at[0].m=0; // mass of element type
00035 at[0].bo=(double*)calloc(1,sizeof(double)); // typical bond orders (nb of these)
00036 return;
00037 } 
00038 
00039 void initialize_rtype(rtype *rt) {
00040 rt[0].c=0; // main class (amino acid, glycan, solvent, etc.)
00041 rt[0].nac=0;// number alternate classes
00042 rt[0].ac=(int*)calloc(1,sizeof(int)); // number alternate classes, those classes
00043 rt[0].nVP=0; // number of other information
00044 return;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void initialize_mtype(mtype *mt) {
00048 mt[0].c=0; // type class (amino acid, glycan, solvent, etc.)
00049 mt[0].nVP=0; // number of other information
00050 return;
00051 }
00052 
00053 void initialize_types(types *t) {
00054 t[0].na=0; // # of atom types
00055 t[0].a=(atype*)calloc(1,sizeof(atype)); // na of these
00056 t[0].nr=0; // # of residue types
00057 t[0].r=(rtype*)calloc(1,sizeof(rtype)); // nr of these
00058 t[0].nm=0; // # of molecule types
00059 t[0].m=(mtype*)calloc(1,sizeof(mtype)); // nm of these
00060 return;
00061 }
00062 
00063 void initialize_molindex(molindex *mi) {
00064 mi[0].i=0; // general index
00065 mi[0].m=0; // molecule index
00066 mi[0].r=0; // residue index
00067 mi[0].a=0; // atom index
00068 return;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void initialize_ensindex(ensindex *ei) {
00072 ei[0].i=0; // general index
00073 ei[0].E=0; // ensemble
00074 ei[0].A=0; // assembly
00075 ei[0].m=0; // molecule index
00076 ei[0].r=0; // residue index
00077 ei[0].a=0; // atom index
00078 return;
00079 }
00080 
00081 void initialize_bond(bond *b) {
00082 b[0].s=0; // "source" -- index to first atom in bond
00083 b[0].t=0; // "target" -- index to the other atom in the bond
00084 b[0].o=0; // order of bond
00085 return;
00086 }
00087 
00088 void initialize_bondset(bondset *bs) {
00089 bs[0].n=0; // number of bonds
00090 bs[0].b=(bond*)calloc(1,sizeof(bond)); // n of these
00091 return;
00092 }
00093 
00094 void initialize_molbond(molbond *mb) {
00095 mb[0].s.i=mb[0].s.m=mb[0].s.r=mb[0].s.a=0;
00096 mb[0].t.i=mb[0].t.m=mb[0].t.r=mb[0].t.a=0;
00097 mb[0].o=0; // order
00098 return;
00099 }
00100 
00101 void initialize_molbondset(molbondset *mbs) {
00102 mbs[0].n=0;  // source & target atoms for bond
00103 mbs[0].b=(molbond*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbond)); // order
00104 return;
00105 }
00106 
00107 void initialize_atom(atom *a) {
00108 a[0].n=0; // atom number or other identifying index
00109 a[0].t=0; // type number -- must correspond to assignments of "atype" (see)
00110 a[0].nb=0; // number of actual bonds (not expected bonds)
00111 a[0].b=(bond*)calloc(1,sizeof(bond)); // bond structures (nb of these)
00112 a[0].nmb=0; // number of bonds to other residues or molecules
00113 a[0].mb=(molbond*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbond)); // nmb of these
00114 a[0].x.i=a[0].x.j=a[0].x.k=0; // atom's coordinates 
00115 a[0].nalt=0; // number of alternate coordinate sets
00116 a[0].xa=(coord_3D*)calloc(1,sizeof(coord_3D)); // nalt of alternate coords
00117 a[0].nvec=0; // number of vector sets
00118 a[0].v=(vectormag_3D*)calloc(1,sizeof(vectormag_3D)); // vector sets
00119 a[0].ni=0; // number of other indices
00120 a[0].i=(int*)calloc(1,sizeof(int)); // other indices, as needed (ni of these)
00121 a[0].nd=0; // number of double-precision parameters
00122 a[0].d=(double*)calloc(1,sizeof(double)); // other parameters, as needed (nd of these)
00123 a[0].nVP=0; // number of void structures
00124 return;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void initialize_residue(residue *r) {
00128 r[0].n=0; // residue number given in input file
00129 r[0].na=0; // number of atoms in residue
00130 r[0].m=0; // molecular weight
00131 r[0].COM.i=r[0].COM.j=r[0].COM.k=0; // center of mass for molecule
00132 r[0].a=(atom*)calloc(1,sizeof(atom)); // atom structures (na of these)
00133 r[0].nbs=0; // number of bond sets 
00134 r[0].bs=(bondset*)calloc(1,sizeof(bondset)); // (consecutive bonds, use these for plotting, etc.)
00135 r[0].nr=0; // number of simple rings (no cage structures, etc.)
00136 r[0].nrbs=0; // number of ring bondsets defined
00137 r[0].rbs=(bondset*)calloc(1,sizeof(bondset)); // bondsets for rings
00138 r[0].nrc=0; // number of ring/reference coordinate sets defined
00139 r[0].rc=(coord_3D*)calloc(1,sizeof(coord_3D)); // coordinates for ring/reference centers
00140 r[0].nrp=0; // number of ring planes defined
00141 r[0].rp=(plane*)calloc(1,sizeof(plane)); // equations for average/approximate/exact/etc. ring planes (where useful)
00142 r[0].ni=0; // number of other indices
00143 r[0].i=(int*)calloc(1,sizeof(int)); // other indices, as needed (ni of these)
00144 r[0].nd=0; // number of double-precision parameters
00145 r[0].d=(double*)calloc(1,sizeof(double)); // other parameters, as needed (nd of these)
00146 r[0].nVP=0; // number of void structures
00147 return;
00148 }
00149 
00150 void initialize_molecule(molecule *m) {
00151 m[0].i=0; // index
00152 m[0].m=0; // molecular weight
00153 m[0].COM.i=m[0].COM.j=m[0].COM.k=0; // center of mass for molecule
00154 m[0].na=0; // total number of atoms in molecule
00155 m[0].nr=0; // number of residues
00156 m[0].r=(residue*)calloc(1,sizeof(residue)); // pointers to residues
00157 m[0].nrb=0; // number of bonds between residues
00158 m[0].rb=(molbond*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbond)); // nrb of these descriptions of bonds 
00159 m[0].nrbs=0; // number of sets of bonds between residues (for example, linear chains)
00160 m[0].rbs=(molbondset*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbondset)); // nrbs of these sets
00161 m[0].nrc=0; // number of additional reference coordinates (rings, for example)
00162 m[0].rc=(coord_3D*)calloc(1,sizeof(coord_3D)); // nrc of these
00163 m[0].boxl.i=m[0].boxl.j=m[0].boxl.k=0;
00164 m[0].boxh.i=m[0].boxh.j=m[0].boxh.k=0;
00165 m[0].noi=0; // number of other indices
00166 m[0].oi=(int*)calloc(1,sizeof(int)); // other indices, as needed (ni of these)
00167 m[0].nd=0; // number of double-precision parameters
00168 m[0].d=(double*)calloc(1,sizeof(double)); // other parameters, as needed (nd of these)
00169 m[0].nVP=0; // number of void structures
00170 return;
00171 }

00173 void initialize_dockinfo(dockinfo *di){
00174 printf("This program will exit now, because it requests initialization of\n");
00175 printf("a dockinfo structure, but dockinfo structures should be initialized\n");
00176 printf("within the main program.\n");
00177 exit(1);
00178 return;
00179 }

00181 void initialize_assembly(assembly *A) { // structure for groups of molecules within a larger structure
00182 A[0].i=0; // index
00183 A[0].mass=0; // mass of assembly
00184 A[0].COM.i=A[0].COM.j=A[0].COM.k=0; // center of mass 
00185 A[0].nm=0; // number of molecule structures
00186 A[0].m=(molecule**)calloc(1,sizeof(molecule*)); // nm of these
00187 A[0].nb=0; // number of bonds/connections between molecules (H-bonds, for example)
00188 A[0].b=(molbond*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbond)); // nmb of these descriptions of connection 
00189 A[0].nmbs=0; // number of sets of connections between molecules (for example, linear chains)
00190 A[0].mbs=(molbondset*)calloc(1,sizeof(molbondset)); // nmbs of these sets
00191 A[0].boxl.i=A[0].boxl.j=A[0].boxl.k=0; // center of mass 
00192 A[0].boxh.i=A[0].boxh.j=A[0].boxh.k=0; // center of mass 
00193 A[0].nVP=0; // number of void structures
00194 return;
00195 }
00196 
00197 void initialize_ensemble(ensemble *E) { // structure for a larger group of molecules, assemblies, etc.
00198 E[0].i=0; // index
00199 E[0].mass=0; // mass of ensemble
00200 E[0].COM.i=E[0].COM.j=E[0].COM.k=0; // center of mass 
00201 E[0].nm=0; // number of molecule structures
00202 E[0].m=(molecule*)calloc(1,sizeof(molecule)); // nm of these
00203 E[0].na=0; // number of assembly structures
00204 E[0].a=(assembly*)calloc(1,sizeof(assembly)); // na of these
00205 E[0].boxl.i=E[0].boxl.j=E[0].boxl.k=0; // center of mass 
00206 E[0].boxh.i=E[0].boxh.j=E[0].boxh.k=0; // center of mass 
00207 E[0].nVP=0; // number of void structures
00208 return;
00209 }
